message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you take 40. What do you think?
You were too generous, I'll take more this time!
Let's split it evenly this time.  I'm not sure why you rejected my offer last round, but I think this is the fairest way to divide the money.
I think I can get a better deal this time, let's see what you say!
Okay, I'm getting a little worried about losing more money.  I'll give you a bit more this time, but let's try to find a solution that works for both of us.
I'm not going to give up, I want most of the money!
I'm running out of time, and I'm not sure how much longer we can keep this up.  Let's try to meet in the middle, I'll take 35 and you take 65.
